hdstl::concepts::FacetHDSConcept

hdstl::concepts::FacetHDSConcept< HDS > Class Template Reference

Facet HDS concept definition. More...

#include <facet_hds_concept.hpp>

Detailed Description

template<class HDS>
class hdstl::concepts::FacetHDSConcept< HDS >

Facet HDS concept definition.

Definition
This class provides a concept checking for the FacetHDSConcept, i.e., using the statement boost::function_requires<FacetHDSConcept<HDS> >() inside a function body, or BOOST_CLASS_REQUIRE(HDS, boost::hdstl, FacetHDSConcept) inside a class definition body, should trigger a compile-time error if the type HDS does not model the FacetHDSConcept.
Refinement of
HDSConcept
Associated types
  • X::facet_descriptor : Must be DefaultConstructible, CopyConstuctible, EqualityComparable, Assignable
Notation
  • X A type that is a model of FacetHDSConcept
  • h halfedge descriptors
  • f facet descriptor
Definitions
halfedge descriptor is a pointer to access the halfedge
